golang redis client of Bytedance inc.
==

### introduction

a wrapper of redis.v6


### features
- easy metrics
- backend auto discovery
- proxy failover
- proxy load balance



enjoy~

o(*≧▽≦)ツ

### gdpr
- Switch on: Export the environment variable
``` export SEC_KV_AUTH=1```
- Switch off: unset the var
```unset SEC_KV_AUTH```
